general_info.summary: The provided text outlines various sections related to an educational institution, likely Galgotias University. It details information for international students, including admissions, programs, scholarships, and support services. It also covers campus life aspects like clubs, NCC, NSS, sports, and events, alongside student and employee grievance redressal portals and institutional information such as leadership, awards, and policies. Specific programs like the Preparatory English Foundation Program and events like the Smart India Hackathon 2022 are also mentioned.
